DialogueOption.Text: Pray for the inhabitants of the Lonely Hermit...

Dialogue.Page: The Lonely Hermit, the sole planet of Hearth's Neighbor, was populated by a species of furred amphibians, who tragically found themselves caught in a civil war that ended in the annihilation of their planet and their species.
Only one of their kind escaped, fired from an escape pod on the species' vessel, which eventually landed in Timber Hearth.
May we mourn the unnecessary loss of their kind, and may we pray that the sole survivor lived on.
The Magister was a being of mysteriously immense power and age. His goal was to prevent the universe from ending, what he called the "lie of the Universe".
He journeyed across the universe, picking up individuals of various species in order to help build a Device which would achieve his goal.

There was Vultos, the sole survivor of the war on the Lonely Hermit; Vespa, an inventor of the Stranger's species; Acquarius, a electrical engineer of a four-armed acquatic species; Lily, a Nomai inventor whose invention was laughed at by her peers; a Roja, a botanist and painter belonging to a fluffy insectioid species; and finally, a Hearthian astronaut named Quartz.
Together, they worked to achieve the Magister's vision and ascended to what they call the Outer Planes, a place above time and space where they may float around for all eternity.
Remember their goal, even as the universe ends despite them.
